title: It's Cheaper But Is It As GOOD? - Fujifilm GFX50S II
description: Get 10% off all Jackery products with code LinusTechTips at   Fujifilm's new GFX50S II is a bit of the same, but the insides have been changed a bit. They also made it "affordable" at $4,000, but it is a drop from the GFX100S, which is $10,000. Brandon gives us a quick tour of it today!
